metadata.title: CVE-2024-3860 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-memory condition during object initialization could result in anempty shape list. If the JIT subsequently traced the object it would crash.This vulnerability affects Firefox < 125.

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs102 package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
